visualizations.description: Scatter plot comparing actual vs predicted values
Time series comparison of actual and predicted values across seasons
Residuals plotted across seasons with reference line at zero

data.summary: Model shows significant prediction errors (MAPE 2953.5%) with negative bias (-6.33 mean residual). Residuals appear normally distributed but with high variance (14.98 std). Time series analysis reveals inconsistent prediction accuracy across seasons. Model performance requires improvement through feature engineering or algorithm adjustment.
